title: Premium single-product ecommerce site for Pro 2 ANC Wireless Earbuds (India) with UPI checkout

requirements.text: Build a single-product landing page for “Pro 2 ANC Wireless Earbuds” with these sections in order: (1) Hero with large 3D-floating-style product visual, headline, price “₹1499 (Limited Offer)”, and primary “Buy Now” CTA; (2) Features section highlighting: Active Noise Cancellation, Deep Bass Sound, 30 Hours Battery Backup, Touch Control, Compatible with iPhone and Android; (3) Offer section emphasizing the limited offer price ₹1499; (4) Trust section with “7 Days Replacement” and “Free Shipping India” trust badges.

quotes:
Create a premium single product ecommerce website for selling wireless earbuds in India.

Sections required:
1. Hero section with big product image and Buy Now button
2. Features section with icons
3. Offer section with discounted price
4. Trust section (7 Days Replacement, Free Shipping India)

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page renders all 4 requested sections with English copy and the exact product name and price
Hero contains a prominent “Buy Now” button that navigates to (or opens) the checkout page
Features are presented with recognizable icons and short, scannable text
Trust section clearly shows both trust promises: “7 Days Replacement” and “Free Shipping India”

requirements.text: Implement a premium dark-luxury visual theme (black/near-black base) with an Apple-like clean layout, modern minimal typography, and a soft glow lighting effect around the product visual; apply the theme consistently across landing + checkout without using blue/purple as primary brand colors.

quotes:
Design style:
- Dark luxury theme (black background)
- 3D floating product look
- Modern, minimal and premium
- Soft glow lighting effect around product

Style:
- Premium Apple-like clean layout

acceptanceCriteria: Pages use a consistent dark luxury palette and minimal premium layout
Product visual has a soft glow treatment and subtle depth/3D float effect (e.g., shadow/parallax/tilt/lighting)
No blue/purple is used as the primary brand color

requirements.text: Add smooth scroll behavior and premium micro-animations (e.g., section reveal on scroll, CTA hover/press, subtle parallax/tilt on product) optimized for performance and conversion-focused clarity.

quotes:
Smooth scroll animation
- High conversion focused

acceptanceCriteria: Scrolling between sections feels smooth and consistent
Key elements (hero content, feature cards, offer, trust badges) animate in subtly on first view
Animations do not cause layout shift and remain responsive on mobile

requirements.text: Create a simple, high-conversion checkout page that includes: customer details (name, phone, email optional), shipping address fields (address line(s), city, state, pincode), quantity selector, order summary showing the product name and total price, and a clear “Pay with UPI” step.

quotes:
6. Simple checkout page

5. UPI payment integration

acceptanceCriteria: Checkout is accessible via a dedicated route/page (e.g., /checkout) and from the “Buy Now” CTA
Form validates required fields (at minimum: name, phone, address, city/state, pincode, quantity) and shows inline errors
Order summary displays the exact product name and computed total based on quantity and ₹1499 unit price
UI is mobile-friendly and optimized for fast completion

requirements.text: Implement UPI payment initiation on the checkout page using a UPI intent deep link and a scannable QR code generated on the client. Provide a single, clearly-located configuration for UPI payee details (VPA/UPI ID, payee name, optional transaction note prefix) without hardcoding unknown merchant credentials.
acceptanceCriteria: Checkout generates a valid UPI payment link (upi://pay...) using the configured payee details, amount, and currency INR
Checkout renders a QR code that encodes the same UPI payment payload
Users can click the UPI link on supported devices or scan the QR to pay
Payee configuration is centralized and easy to update without searching multiple files

requirements.text: Add an order flow backed by the Motoko canister: create an order when the user proceeds to payment, store order details (customer info, address, quantity, amount, timestamps) and set initial status to “pending_payment”; allow the frontend to fetch the created order by id to show a confirmation screen with next steps (e.g., “Complete UPI payment, then enter UTR/reference”).
acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes a method to create an order and returns a unique order id
Backend persists orders across canister calls (in-canister stable storage)
Frontend creates an order before showing the UPI payment step and retains the order id for the session
Frontend can retrieve an order by id and render a confirmation view that includes order id and amount

requirements.text: Allow the user to submit a UPI payment reference/UTR after paying; store it on the order and mark status as “payment_submitted” (without claiming automatic payment verification). Show a clear success state explaining that the order will be confirmed after verification.
acceptanceCriteria: Checkout/confirmation UI provides an input for UTR/reference (with basic validation)
Backend updates the order with the provided reference and changes status accordingly
Frontend displays a final confirmation screen indicating payment reference received and that verification is pending
The app does not imply real-time/automatic UPI verification

requirements.text: Add a lightweight navigation structure for a single-product site: top nav with product name and a “Buy Now” button, and footer with basic India-focused trust/support text; keep all user-facing text in English.

quotes: Use English for any user-facing text in the build request.

acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation is present on landing and checkout pages
Footer is present and styled consistently with the premium theme
All visible UI text is English and matches the product/offer details provided by the user

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only add migration.mo if an upgrade requires it
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths; compose them instead
No third-party authentication providers; only Internet Identity is permitted (not required for this build)
Do not claim automatic UPI payment verification or real-time payment status from banks/apps
nonGoals: Building a multi-product catalog, cart system for multiple SKUs, or inventory management
Integrating external payment gateways or bank verification APIs for UPI status
Adding admin dashboards unless explicitly requested later

required: 3D floating wireless earbuds hero render on black background with soft rim glow and subtle reflections (product-hero.dim_1600x1200.png)
Wide dark luxury abstract background texture with subtle gradients/noise (bg-luxury.dim_1920x1080.png)
